thread.title: aston martin DB4 zagato classic car renderings
thread.title_full: aston martin DB4 zagato classic car renderings

author: martin hislop I designboom
title: aston martin DB4 zagato classic car renderings
text:
aston martin DB4 zagato classic car renderings 

dubbed the ‘DB4 zagato’, these elegant car renderings depict the 1960’s for automotive brand, aston martin . swedish designer, martin öberg, has created several concepts in the past. based in jönköping, öberg has created no less than seven other captivating concept vehicles, all of which exhibit a unique and authentic interpretation of each brand. 
images © martin öberg 


martin öberg’s ‘DB4 zagato’ renderings celebrate such a resolution level of graphical detail that they can easily be confused for the original aston martin . upon closer inspection of the headlamps and front grille area, it can be seen how much this classic car image has influenced the current generation of MINI s. just as the classic ‘DB4 zagato’ had influenced him, öberg’s renderings can serve to inspire manufacturer’s designers to learn from the past, to design truly elegant and timeless cars.
